title: Bulgaria's daily COVID-19 deaths rise to record high - Reuters
description: Bulgaria reported a record number of daily coronavirus deaths on Tuesday as the European Union's least vaccinated country grapples with a fourth wave of the pandemic, official data showed on Tuesday.

title: In photos: US borders reopen after Covid-19 travel ban
description: The United States reopened its borders to vaccinated international travelers on Monday, welcoming many visitors who have been shut out of the country for nearly 20 months.
content:
Alison Henry embraces her son Liam in New York after a flight arrived from the United Kingdom on Monday, November 8.

author: Story by Reuters
title: Indian homegrown Covid-19 shot wins WHO emergency use approval
description: The World Health Organization (WHO) said on Wednesday that it has granted approval for Indian drugmaker Bharat Biotech's home-grown Covid-19 vaccine for emergency use listing, paving the way for it to be accepted as a valid vaccine in many poor countries.

author: Reuters Staff
title: Tech and healthcare firms drag Hong Kong shares lower - Reuters
description: Hong Kong shares finished lower on Monday, dragged down by tech giants and healthcare stocks, with COVID-19 vaccine-related stocks slumping after Pfizer's advancement in coronavirus medicine.
content:
By Reuters Staff

title: Belgium extends mask use, enforces home working as COVID-19 spikes - Reuters
description: Belgium tightened its coronavirus restrictions on Wednesday, mandating wider use of masks and enforcing work from home, as cases spiked in the country's fourth COVID-19 wave.
content: A shopper, wearing a protective face masks, looks at a poster for a coronavirus disease (COVID-19) vaccination centre installed inside a supermarket in Brussels, Belgium, August 30, 2021. REUTERS/Bar… [+1764 chars]

title: Brazil reports 12301 cases of coronavirus and 293 COVID deaths in 24 hours -ministry - Reuters
description: Brazil has had 12,301 new cases of the novel coronavirus reported in the past 24 hours, and 293 deaths from COVID-19, the health ministry said on Thursday.

title: UK reports 293 more COVID-19 deaths, 33865 further cases - Reuters
description: Britain on Tuesday reported a further 293 deaths within 28 days of a positive COVID-19 test and 33,865 more coronavirus cases, according to official data.

title: Brazil reports 217 COVID deaths in 24 hours, toll average lowest since April 2020 -ministry - Reuters
description: Brazil has had 8,833 new cases of the novel coronavirus reported in the past 24 hours, and 217 deaths from COVID-19, the health ministry said on Saturday.
